TimePeriods module¶

Find Time Period of Orbits of Particles from CSV File

TimePeriods.TimePeriod(n, filepath)[source]¶

Code to find the time period of revolution of every particle

Parameters:

  • n (int) – Number of Particles

  • filepath (string) – Path of folder containing input CSVs
